channel.title: How do i make npcs talk out loud (508 bulby)
channel.description: i wanna know how to make npcs talk out loud, not npc dialog just to make them say things out loud! so if someone has the code please put here i know where to put and where to add npcs to talk out loud but i cant get the code right...

item.title: How do i make npcs talk out loud (508 bulby)
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Go to npcs file and go to NPC.java and under the process() method add:

if (npcType == NpcId) { requestText("what ya wanna say here bitch"); }

item.title: How do i make npcs talk out loud (508 bulby)
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[quote=“Setsuna, post:2, topic:264340”]NPCHandler class.

                if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOUR TEXT HERE";
                    }
                }

That’s for a 317…Dunno if it’s the same for a 508. Don’t have one. o:

Also…Replace my tect with yours…“YOUR TEXT HERE” and “NPCID”

Obviously…:P[/quote]

                if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOUR TEXT HERE";
                    }
                }

item.title: How do i make npcs talk out loud (508 bulby)
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

NPCHandler class.

                if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOUR TEXT HERE";
                    }
                }

That’s for a 317…Dunno if it’s the same for a 508. Don’t have one. o:

Also…Replace my tect with yours…“YOUR TEXT HERE” and “NPCID”

Obviously…
